metadata.name: Golden Rain
metadata.description:
PHYGITAL ART COLLECTION!
Each collector will receive a 1/1 designed hat displayed on the art-work together with NFT .
Pola Rubis wearable art hats is created to build awareness around identity and uniqueness of each individual.  
Each hat hand made and one of a kind.
This project was born 4 years ago, when Pola was using hats as a canvas to express her emotions in a very challenging life chapter.
She is a big advocate for healing through art.

This wear is very comfortable and incredible striking.
Art wear can be displayed as a wall art. 
Water proof. 
Hat size: S/M
